page.title: 18CHARLTON_H.SOCIAL CONCERNS 1
page.content: With a population of over{500 people roughly a quarter of these are children so with no school in the area they are transported by school buses to nearby areas.Most families own at least one car,and many generously offer lifts to non_drivers.Buses are infrequent,twice every week to Swindon and Cirencester.Postal vans deliver mail once &collect twice a day.With no surgery in the area people rely on the Malmesbury doctors and district nurses for home visits and are transported to {Malmesbury District Hospital}for physiotherapy and specialist clinics.This hospital has been kept open,and much of its equipment bought by the{Hospital League of Friends.} This is a close_knit community.{ {
